xwikidoc.name: UpdateWiki
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
Updates the wiki document of a wiki by using values from the request.
The 'wikiId' parameter is used to identify the wiki document and the request values update the objects of classes [[XWiki.XWikiServerClass]], [[WikiManager.WikiUserClass]] and [[WikiManager.WikiTemplateClass]] objects which are already stored in the wiki document.
The 'xredirect' parameter is also accepted, currently used in the administration section of a wiki.
{{velocity}} #set ($wikiId = $request.wikiId) ## ## TODO: use a dependency check macro. ## #if ("$!wikiId" == '') {{error}}$services.localization.render('platform.workspace.oneParameterNotSpecified', ["wikiId"]){{/error}} #else #set ($wiki = $services.wiki.getById($wikiId)) #if (!$wiki) #if (!$services.wiki.lastException) {{error}}{{translation key="workspacemanager.error.workspacedoesnotexist" parameters="$wikiId"/}}{{/error}} #elseif("$!{services.wiki.lastException.message}" != '') {{error}}$services.localization.render('platform.workspace.exceptionWithMessage', [$services.wiki.lastException.message]){{/error}} #else {{error}}$services.wiki.lastException.class{{/error}} #end #else #set ($temp = $wiki.setPrettyName($request.get('XWiki.XWikiServerClass_0_wikiprettyname'))) #set ($temp = $wiki.setDescription($request.get('XWiki.XWikiServerClass_0_description'))) #set ($newOwner = $request.get('XWiki.XWikiServerClass_0_owner')) #if (!$newOwner.startsWith("${services.wiki.mainWikiId}:")) #set ($newOwner = "${services.wiki.mainWikiId}:${newOwner}") #end #if ($xwiki.exists($newOwner)) #set ($temp = $wiki.setOwnerId($newOwner)) #end #set ($temp = $services.wiki.saveDescriptor($wiki)) #end #if($request.xredirect) $response.sendRedirect($request.xredirect) #end #end {{/velocity}}
